content:
Welcome to my Academic site, where I share updates on my research projects.
 I will be joining University of California, San Diego in Fall 2020 as a master’s student majoring in Computer Science & Engineering.
Currently, I’m working as a year-round Research Intern at Alibaba Platform of AI (PAI), where I’m lucky enough to work with a fantastic team on solving problems in the systems side of Machine Learning. My main focus here is the automatic planning of Hybrid Parallelism strategy for training Deep Learning Models.
-- I obtained my Bacholar’s degree at University of Wisconsin - Madison. I double-majored in Computer Science and Mathematics there, and maintained both major GPAs above 3.91. In May 2019, I graduated with distinction in my junior year.
